attributes.action: Give legal Status to those spent a decade in UK with no criminal record
attributes.additional_details:
For someone who is illegal and have spent a decade in UK definitely have a reason to choose a miserable life to live in hostile UK environment and not going back home country.
Some immigrants are very well qualified became victim of complex immigration law and unknowingly became overstayer and a lot more have developed their family life have kids and family can fill gap in UK labour workforce and pay taxes.
attributes.background: Overstayer or illegal immigrants who have been living in UK for more than 10 years and have no criminal record should be given immediate status so they can live their life as a normal people.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608918

If you'd like to start a new, different petition, you'll need to include your full name.
